articles.author: Lily Hautau
articles.title: ‘Ring of fire’ solar eclipse: February 2026 path, visibility over Antarctica and partial eclipse for South Africa - CNN
articles.description: A “ring of fire” solar eclipse will be visible on Tuesday, with the best views in Antarctica and partial eclipse views in Africa and South America.
articles.content:
A ring of fire solar eclipse on Tuesday will mark the first eclipse of 2026, but only about 2% of the worlds population will get to see it, according to Time and Date.
The event, also called an annu… [+5618 chars]

articles.title: Aliens are ‘real,’ Obama says, as Washington shrugs - The Washington Post
articles.description: The former president appeared to confirm decades-old conspiracy theories. Lawmakers say Barack Obama is simply saying what many Americans already believe.
articles.content:
Former president Barack Obama this weekend appeared to drop an otherworldly bombshell: extraterrestrials exist.
Theyre real, but I havent seen them, Obama said in a podcast released Saturday. Theres… [+121 chars]
